channel.title: Moparscape
channel.description:
As other crap is posted in this section. Why not just post it here?
Alright, well Moparscape is the place all the other popular sites laugh at for our, Server Status, Forums, noobs, and mainly how nothing is done on this site.
We have 3 main reasons.
1)Our sections are awful, as we don't even have a snippets section, (we have a sticky), and we don't have a 508+ sections, 317 section, 377-474 section. Client hacking, is not even "hacking" as we know so much about a client its considered a client tutorial/snippet Tutorials, are just about only login protocals (which no one cares about in the community), our tutorials also have nothing useful for beginners (more tutorials, less questions) Our help threads are dead awful (i try to help when i'm on)
2) Awful staff, we have a bunch of random crap posted in the client hacking section (including this) and nothing is being done, but a lock MAYBE. This is NOT a help section people. The staff is mostly rude to newer players, and other people who post maybe "Noobish" things. (SilentCj your doing great)
3) Updates, polls.. We [b]ARE NOT INFORMED[/b] on anything that goes on here, we are A [b]COMMUNITY[/b] meaning, we should have polls, news, announcements, and updates on what goes on here.
People like me who have been here for 3 years, and watched this community fall is apart, is pretty sad. Once the #1 community, became the worst known community for its lack of these things, and failure of updates.
This community will end up dying without these proper things, as 317 servers are not like what they were.
Thanks - The Elve Age

@silabsoft wrote:

What are these so called better sites? Kevins? more private same idiots.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2010, 11:33:06 pm[/size][hr]we also have a crying topic just for this sort of thing please post there.

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

@Bone Army Productions (multi quoting is annoying)

Most like Lin said shouldn’t be on the internet, and screw with their computer and mess it up.
I tried to make one when i was 11, and i screwed up my comp.

No we are not telling you to get rid of models, or to do what ever to your models, we are saying models which do not belong in RUNESCAPE MODELS in a RUNESCAPE private server should not be in modeling section.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:
@BoneArmyProductions wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:9, topic:324144”]M[quote author=BoneArmyProductions link=topic=420545.msg3089290#msg3089290 date=1262746337]
even though i agree with Miss Silabsoft, for the first time, I agree with him too, she is rude. she has not helped me one bit.

other than the fact that your hard coding like a moron?

Didn’t help me at all.

tbh Miss Silab, not many of us know enough about coding to make all items load threw the cache like you do. So please dont call us people Morons

ON TOPIC- try using a switch statement instead of doing all of that. Enabling switch statements in that file ill allow MANY items to be created instead of it just being limited, your multiplying it by almost 20

Coon Hunter helped though,
It bothers me how MissSilabSoft doesn’t really help as much as other people do.
[/quote]

Miss Silabsoft if what admin/Super mod? And she is the most rude person here?

Ha thats funny.

@ The Soul, are you too blind to see whats happening in this community?[/quote][quote=“Lin, post:17, topic:324144”][quote author=wolfs goal link=topic=420545.msg3089286#msg3089286 date=1262746157]
I agree.

Moparscape should had the model section, but have different sections.

like:

Helmets
Swords
Armour
Bows
Shields

Also, like you said a 317 section, 377, 474, 508 ect…

Then there should be a section for emotes, maps, and other client related stuff…

Moparscape is getting organized with the Interface section…

Not a bad idea, but then again, there is no hope for mopar. It’s all leechers…
[/quote]The model section shouldn’t even be there. Nearly every model in there has NOTHING to do with RSPS, and are just to show off your skills. The admin who added it was out of their mind or saw that the stubborn people of MoparScape didn’t care about development, but only creating models because they love comments.

We don’t have awful staff overall. There isn’t really any bad staff member, but sections that are bad. For example, this board. It’s not Fat_Cookies or whoever else that moderates this board’s fault.

Another reason we’re stuck behind all of the other communities is because very few people who really know what they’re doing stay to help and continue with RSPS, as everyone else just quits or goes onto MITB. There is also no active global moderators or admins here, and it’s not like any of the admins do anything. I haven’t seen Lothy do anything in a long time, Niall is apparently lazy as fuck, and Moparisthebest is way too busy to even come on. All of the other admins are never active either.

Finally, almost the whole community has no experience in anything. Most are extremely young and shouldn’t even be using the internet, and others are just either into RSPS for the money (which is sad and any server that sells something on it should be prohibited, but sadly the staff are too blind to realize that’s killing private servers/horrible) or just want to be able to run their own server, whether or not it’s been edited by them.[/quote]
Most? Most people here, believe it or not, don’t even know how to run a server, and whats with you trying to stop us on modeling and making our own stuff for our private servers?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2010, 09:37:37 pm[/size][hr][quote=“The Soul, post:11, topic:324144”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=420545.msg3089298#msg3089298 date=1262746584]
M[quote author=BoneArmyProductions link=topic=420545.msg3089290#msg3089290 date=1262746337]
even though i agree with Miss Silabsoft, for the first time, I agree with him too, she is rude. she has not helped me one bit.

other than the fact that your hard coding like a moron?

Didn’t help me at all.

tbh Miss Silab, not many of us know enough about coding to make all items load threw the cache like you do. So please dont call us people Morons

ON TOPIC- try using a switch statement instead of doing all of that. Enabling switch statements in that file ill allow MANY items to be created instead of it just being limited, your multiplying it by almost 20

Coon Hunter helped though,
It bothers me how MissSilabSoft doesn’t really help as much as other people do.
[/quote]

Miss Silabsoft if what admin/Super mod? And she is the most rude person here?

Ha thats funny.

@ The Soul, are you too blind to see whats happening in this community?
[/quote]

You’re obviously too ignorant to realize what the staff actually do for the community.[/quote]
Maybe your right. they are here to moderate, But miss silabsoft, I have never seen her do anything by moderating.
and if you didn’t get my point. Whats a moderator that’s rude?

Read full topic

I agree.

Moparscape should had the model section, but have different sections.

like:

Helmets
Swords
Armour
Bows
Shields

Also, like you said a 317 section, 377, 474, 508 ect…

Then there should be a section for emotes, maps, and other client related stuff…

Moparscape is getting organized with the Interface section…

Not a bad idea, but then again, there is no hope for mopar. It’s all leechers…
[/quote]The model section shouldn’t even be there. Nearly every model in there has NOTHING to do with RSPS, and are just to show off your skills. The admin who added it was out of their mind or saw that the stubborn people of MoparScape didn’t care about development, but only creating models because they love comments.

We don’t have awful staff overall. There isn’t really any bad staff member, but sections that are bad. For example, this board. It’s not Fat_Cookies or whoever else that moderates this board’s fault.

Another reason we’re stuck behind all of the other communities is because very few people who really know what they’re doing stay to help and continue with RSPS, as everyone else just quits or goes onto MITB. There is also no active global moderators or admins here, and it’s not like any of the admins do anything. I haven’t seen Lothy do anything in a long time, Niall is apparently lazy as fuck, and Moparisthebest is way too busy to even come on. All of the other admins are never active either.

Finally, almost the whole community has no experience in anything. Most are extremely young and shouldn’t even be using the internet, and others are just either into RSPS for the money (which is sad and any server that sells something on it should be prohibited, but sadly the staff are too blind to realize that’s killing private servers/horrible) or just want to be able to run their own server, whether or not it’s been edited by them.[/quote]

Very very well put. If we honestly had organized sections (i’m not saying this cause i’m a “noob”)
I would actually release some of my stuff.
As for most of MY work is server sided, and i can’t even post without a decent tutorial section.

The model section should be “Runescape Models” As high poly models aren’t excepted in there anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

The model section isn’t bad. Even though as you said half as nothing to do with rsps or is just a recolor. The few that post and release there models are good. like my cutlass I released, it could be added into runescape to replace the scims, or just as a new item. Now people relasing guns and stuff for clients are just plain stupid.

@the_soul wrote:

the elve age:

As other crap is posted in this section. Why not just post it here?

Because there’s already a thread regarding this…here.

And about your rant about the staff: it’s not their fault, it’s the community as a whole’s. We’re not doing our job by reporting enough. They don’t need to spend their own time sifting through threads looking for rule-breakers when one individual can report it and it’s dealt with.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

As other crap is posted in this section. Why not just post it here?

Alright, well Moparscape is the place all the other popular sites laugh at for our, Server Status, Forums, noobs, and mainly how nothing is done on this site.

We have 3 main reasons.

1)Our sections are awful, as we don’t even have a snippets section, (we have a sticky), and we don’t have a 508+ sections, 317 section, 377-474 section.
Client hacking, is not even “hacking” as we know so much about a client its considered a client tutorial/snippet
Tutorials, are just about only login protocals (which no one cares about in the community), our tutorials also have nothing useful for beginners (more tutorials, less questions)
Our help threads are dead awful (i try to help when i’m on)

  1. Awful staff, we have a bunch of random crap posted in the client hacking section (including this) and nothing is being done, but a lock MAYBE. This is NOT a help section people. The staff is mostly rude to newer players, and other people who post maybe “Noobish” things. (SilentCj your doing great)

  2. Updates, polls… We ARE NOT INFORMED on anything that goes on here, we are A COMMUNITY
    meaning, we should have polls, news, announcements, and updates on what goes on here.

People like me who have been here for 3 years, and watched this community fall is apart, is pretty sad. Once the #1 community, became the worst known community for its lack of these things, and failure of updates.

This community will end up dying without these proper things, as 317 servers are not like what they were.

Thanks - The Elve Age

Read full topic
